Launched referral ecosystem site of ReferralLinks.com June 2019. Chrome Extension Dec 2019 automated referral alerts. Full Social commerce platform 2020. It's all kicking off...

jobs.title: Marketing Intern @ ReferralCodes - Part-time & PAID
jobs.description:
We're recruiting for a smart growth hacker to boost site visitors and account sign-ups to ReferralCodes, the one-stop site for referrals.

* Current student or recent graduate, you will need to have street smarts and some digital know-how - you won't need to be spoon-fed but you'll listen to guidance and you'll know how to track results and experiment.

* We're targeting demographics of students, young families and those with special focus on money-saving behaviours.

* Your role is to make some noise and pursue the various marketing initiatives we have in place. There is LOTS to go for here, and the venture is taking off and we'll be raising additional funding end 2019.

*For the right applicant, there could be a full-time job and equity.

You'll learn loads from an experienced CEO, and we'll pay you for your time.

Check out the site, and send us a message with how you could boost usage!

jobs.title: CTO wanted - Hazardous journey, low wages, constant danger
jobs.description:
As Shackleton boldly stated in 1913: "Men wanted for hazardous journey to the South Pole. Small wages, bitter cold, long months of complete darkness, constant danger. Safe return doubtful. Honour and recognition in case of success."

Referral Codes is remarkably similar. We're looking for a digital tech pioneer to drive growth of our fast-expanding service to lofty levels. You'll need the aptitude as well as the attitude. 

To continue this metaphor.... we're now entering deep waters. We're already the biggest referral aggregator anywhere, and we are now launching an exceptionally exciting referral platform to enable *anyone* to refer *anyone* - in short, bringing 'word of mouth' online, with the potential to enable $billions of gross-merchandise value. Making influencers of friends, and driving sales to e-commerce merchants.

So you'll need tech smarts and street smarts. Excellent product knowledge, cross-platform. You'll also need people smarts as we're set to grow our team. You're hungry and super hard-working. Time to get on board.
